title: Preview: Season 16, The Little Mermaid
description: Elizabeth previews Season 16, a premium exclusive that features a translation of the original Danish fairy tale, “The Little Mermaid,” written by Hans Christian Andersen and published for the first time in 1837. To enjoy these episodes, try The Sleepy Bookshelf Premium free for 7 days: https://sleepybookshelf.supercast.com/.
